column6:
This is it! The concluding chapter of this untold tale in Avengers' history. The Super-Adaptoid has returned for its final revenge... facing off against the one Avenger whose powers it cannot duplicate: the Vision! It's all-out android carnage in the streets of Manhattan -- the moment where this unlikely lineup of Avengers will finally prove their worth once and for all!,2007,4
32 PGS./CARDSTOCK COVER/Rated A ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Joe Casey | penciller (cover):Dave Johnson | inker:Tom Palmer | colorist:Wil Quintana | penciller:William Rosado | letterer:Richard Starkings
